entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Forillon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain after midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
